text:
@ProjectLincoln Dinner Theatre with a side of Covid-19 for dessert. 

I've been listening  - I live not 2 far from the BOK, & didn't hear a frigging thing, LOL!!! It's an UNUSUALLY quiet Sat. night even with a curfew - Thurs & Fri. nights were jumping by comparison.
